projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, sorted thought display by recency, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app fetching weather data from OpenWeatherMap API. Key features include presenting weather data, incorporating functionalities such as displaying current weather, sunrise/sunset times, 5-day forecast and a search function for different cities.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: A React app template to display albums. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. The focus is on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Chatbot
projects.description: A chatbot developed with JavaScript, focusing on user input handling. A structured conversational flow was implemented, along with conditional responses for invalid inputs.

projects.name: Survey
projects.description: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Followed a given design in Figma and prioritised accessibility using Google Lighthouse.

projects.name: To Do App
projects.description: Create a todo app utilizing the Context API, allowing users to add, list, and remove tasks while ensuring a clean design. Build components, manage state with Context and implement features such as adding tasks and customizing checkboxes.

projects.name: Movie Collection
projects.description: Movie library with data fetched from themoviedb.org's API. Features include display movie list, rendering movie specifics, and managing image URLs. Enhancements include error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists.
